name: MagickaLab
description:
Made for the #IWantToCreate #FusionWars Jam.

HOW DO I PLAY?

WASD - Movement

Shift - Sprint

Mouse - Look

Tab - Open Menu

Left Click - equip primary weapon

Right Click - equip secondary weapon

Click - use magic

R - sheath selected weapons

E - pickup item

WHAT DO I DO?

Fight your way through endless rounds of minions and bosses(only one so far) 

With a godlike mad scientist on the loose, your magic may stop him. Be wary traveler

KNOWN BUGS? (Ignore this, it's just a to-do list for me)

Enemy AI fighting glitched with lots of entities(Currently Fixing as of 1/5/18)

Unfinished Map (Not a bug, but eh, it needs to be finished)


FIXED BUGS?

Player wind magic does not push enemies - Apostate Games
